---
category: news
title: "Fake news generated by artificial intelligence can be convincing enough to trick even experts"
excerpt: "We found that it is possible for artificial intelligence systems to generate false information in critical fields like medicine and defence that is convincing enough to fool experts. General misinformation often aims to tarnish the reputation of companies or public figures."
